name: Exam Tank Game
description:
Description shamelessly stolen from your exam game.

Aim the tank with the mouse and hold left button to shoot.

Turn on wind for a greater challenge.

Turn on Lindsay-mode for a lesser challenge. In this mode you can trigger a Cluster-Bomb by by pressing space.

Destroy the enemy tank before running out of ammo to win.

Use 1-9 (and 0) keys to auto-switch between levels:

  1. Default
  2. Black Holes
  3. Homing Missiles
  4. Shield
  5. Moving Bouncy Barriers
  6. Cluster Bomb
  7. Laser Web
  8. Cinemachine & Minions
  9. Influence the direction of the missile with up and down arrow keys
  10. Moving bouncy barriers with a bullet that fires straight (Ignores gravity)

Press R to reload the current level.

Press Q to return to main menu at any time.

SFX/Music from 

  • Background: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/download/retro-platforming/454
  • Sound Effect:
    • Shoot: https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/search/shoot/ Gunner sound by DeathMarty
    • Tank Explosion: https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/search/explosion/ HQ Explosion by Quaker540
    • Bullet Explosion: https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/search/explosion/ transition explosion by Cristian Changing

GFX originally sourced from (some edited/adpated):

  • Background/platforms: Brackeys https://brackeysgames.itch.io/date-night
  • Blackhole: https://free-game-assets.itch.io/pixel-art-magic-sprite-sheet-effects
  • Font: Fredoka One, Google Fonts: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Fredoka Oceania English, Regular 400
  • Tank spritesheet and background images by Kenney from https://www.kenney.nl/assets/tanks and https://www.kenney.nl/assets/background-elements-redux used under CC0 Public Domain license.
